attributes.action: Government Funding for zoo's and aquariums across the UK
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to get more involved with zoos and aquariums.
attributes.background: The 100M that the government gave to zoos and aquariums was not enough and they need further and more stable consistent government funding.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330265
